metadata.title: Portuguese Placement Test - Complete Pragmatic Allocation
metadata.description: Complete question bank with ~215 strategically allocated questions. Grammar: production-heavy. Vocabulary: comprehension-heavy. Complex tenses: expanded production testing.

assessmentTypes.comprehension: ~95 questions - Portuguese to English with 6-7 strategic distractors
assessmentTypes.production: ~120 questions - English to Portuguese with 8-10 strategic distractors

metadata.changelog: v7.1: Fixed 18 critical ambiguity issues (17 tense, 1 gender)

phases.name: Foundation (A1)
phases.description: Absolute beginner - basic identity, present tense, articles, simple verbs

phases.name: Elementary (A2)
phases.description: Elementary - past tenses, questions, comparisons, irregular verbs

phases.name: Upper-Intermediate (B2)
phases.description: Upper-intermediate - future tense, conditional, subjunctive moods, advanced usage

scoring.comprehensionOnly: Can understand but not produce - needs speaking/writing practice
scoring.both: True mastery - can understand AND produce
scoring.placementLogic: Last unit where BOTH comprehension AND production passed

questions.en: I am from the United States
